phase.title: Phase
phase.description: Phase 1 discover agent names; Phase 2 enrich phones & emails for found names.

sources.title: Site adapters
sources.description: Which directories to crawl in Phase 1.

namesCsvUrl.title: Names CSV for Phase 2 (optional)
namesCsvUrl.description: If provided, Phase 2 will read names from this CSV URL instead of Phase 1 dataset. One name per row or column header 'name'.

bingApiKey.title: Bing Web Search API key (optional)
bingApiKey.description: Speeds up Phase 2 search. If omitted, actor uses lightweight on-page searches without paid APIs.

maxPagesPerName.title: Max result pages to visit per name

proxyGroups.title: Apify proxy groups (optional)
proxyGroups.description: e.g., SHADER, RESIDENTIAL. Leave empty to run without proxy.
